mint.filemakers.xsd
Class AbstractXsdTreeStruct

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      mint.filemakers.xsd.AbstractXsdTreeStruct
Direct Known Subclasses:
XsdTreeStructImpl, XsdTreeStructImpl
public abstract class AbstractXsdTreeStruct
extends java.util.Observable

This Class creates and manages a tree representation of a XML schema

Author:
Arnaud Ceol, University of Rome "Tor Vergata", Mint group, arnaud@cbm.bio.uniroma2.it

Field Summary
 boolean autoDuplicate
          if this variable is setted to true (by the constructor) while expanding a node, the tree will automaticaly create the minimum amount of nodes required according by the schema

treeModel

public javax.swing.tree.DefaultTreeModel treeModel

autoDuplicate

public boolean autoDuplicate
if this variable is setted to true (by the constructor) while expanding a node, the tree will automaticaly create the minimum amount of nodes required according by the schema

expendChoices

public java.util.ArrayList expendChoices
this hashmap keep trace of choices made by user when expanding the tree. It is usefull for example in case of saving/loading . It associate a path (String) to a name.

manageChoices

public boolean manageChoices
if this variable is setted to true (by the constructor) while expanding a node that discribe a choice, the tree will give to the user the possibility to choose what element to expand. Else all possibility is displayed

schema

public org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Schema schema
the schema

schemaFile

public java.io.File schemaFile
the xsl file describing the schema

schemaURL

public java.net.URL schemaURL

refType

public static java.lang.String refType
type for references used for going deeper in case of normalized document

refAttribute

public static java.lang.String refAttribute

refTypeList

public static java.util.ArrayList refTypeList
List of the types found in the schema that descrobe a reference to an element

AbstractXsdTreeStruct

public AbstractXsdTreeStruct(boolean autoduplicate,
                             boolean manageChoices)
Returns an instance of AbstractXslTree

Parameters:
autoduplicate - indicates that new nodes will be automaticly created according to the minimum defined in the schema (minOccurs)

emptySelectionLists

public abstract void emptySelectionLists()
this method should reinitialize every variable makin reference to the actual tree, such as any List used to make associations to externals objects.

createTree

public void createTree()
create the tree according to the schema loaded. The root node is displayed

getChildrenCount

public int getChildrenCount(XsdNode node,
                            java.lang.String childrenName)
get the number of children with given name for a node used for example to know if the maximum number of node of that type is already reach or to create the minimum number of node of that type required according to the schema

getChoices

public java.util.ArrayList getChoices(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.Group g)
an enumeration of all children add recursively to this enumeration the childrens of childrens if child is a choice

retrun true if an element of this type is a reference to another element.

getInfos

public java.lang.String getInfos(XsdNode node)
describes the node with informations such as its name or its XML type. Other informations should probably have to be added when extending this class

Parameters:
node - the node on which informations are required
Returns:
a string describing informations about the node
